name: Gift Buddypress Addons
author: aiyaz

sections.description:
This plugin gives BuddyPress members to send virtual gifts.

  • Admin can add/edit/delete gifts list.
  • BuddyPress Member can choose a gift from the gift box and send a gift along with a message to the selected recipient.
  • BuddyPress Recipient can view the received gifts and messages.
  • Auto complete on user selection list
  • Display notification when user received a gift.
  • Uses Ajax while sending a gift.
  • Elegant success/error notice after sending a gift.
  • Simple and responsive page layout
  • Label language translation support.

Upgrade Notice

  • NOTE: Changed database structure so you might lose your existing gift history.
  • NOTE: Deactivate and reactivate plugin after upgrade.
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add new gifts from WordPress admin and user will be able to see gifts tab on the member profile page.
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with this plugin? Use this support channels appropriately.

  1. Support Forum

Installation Instructions

How to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add new gifts from WordPress admin and user will be able to see gifts tab on the member profile page.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Added autocomplete on user selection list
  • Added notification after sending a gift.
  • Added ajax while sending a gift.
  • Added success/error notice after sending a gift.
  • Changes in send and received gift page design to make it compatible with all themes.
  • Added language translation support.
  • Removed extra js and css code.

1.2.0

  • Fixed JQuery conflict issue with other plugins.
  • Fixed all the reported bugs.
  • Fixed design issues.

1.1

  • This is major changes kindly take a backup of your existing plugin.
  • Fixed all the bugs and notice.
  • Changed GUI of gifts.
  • Added Gift Categories.
  • Added Message along with a gift.
  • Removed mycred point system to make process simple.

1.0

  • A change from the previous version.
  • Another change.

1.0

This version is basic release.

short_description: Gift Buddypress Add-ons provide gift management functionality with BuddyPress plugin.

screenshots.caption: Display all available gifts and form to send a gift.
